    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(String protocol,
               org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpRequest request,
               int matchLevels,
               Channel... channels)

        Creates a new request event with the associated Request.Completed event.

        Parameters:
        protocol - the protocol as reported by requestUri()
        request - the request data
        matchLevels - the number of elements from the request path to use in the match value (see matchValue)
        channels - the channels associated with this event

        Creates the appropriate derived request event type from a given HttpRequest.

        Parameters:
        request - the HTTP request
        secure - whether the request was received over a secure channel
        matchLevels - the match levels
        Returns:

      • requestUri

        public URI requestUri()

        Returns an absolute URI of the request that is built from the information provided by the decoder.

        Returns:
        the URI

      • defaultCriterion

        public Object defaultCriterion()

        The match value consists of the event class and a URI. The URI is similar to the request URI but its path elements are shortened as specified in the constructor.

        As the match value is used as key in a map that speeds up the lookup of handlers, having the complete URI in the match value would inflate this map.

        Specified by:
        defaultCriterion in interface Eligible
        Overrides:
        defaultCriterion in class Event<Void>
        Returns:
        the class of this event
        See Also:
        Event.defaultCriterion()

      • isEligibleFor

        public boolean isEligibleFor(Object value)
        Description copied from class: Event

        Returns true if the criterion is of the same class or a base class of this event’s class.

        Specified by:
        isEligibleFor in interface Eligible
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
